hero.title: Hi, I'm
hero.name: Zaíra Gonçalves
hero.subtitle: I'm a front-end developer passionate about creating exceptional web experiences. I specialize in React and have experience in developing modern and responsive web applications.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer with over 4 years of experience in web development and enterprise solutions.

intro.description: Specialized in creating modern and scalable web solutions, focusing on SharePoint, React, and Node.js. I have solid experience in developing enterprise applications and responsive interfaces that provide excellent user experience.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: Over the past 4 years, I've been dedicated to developing innovative enterprise solutions. My journey began as a front-end developer, evolved into systems analysis, and today I work as a full stack developer, always striving to create exceptional user experiences.

achievements: Development and maintenance of SharePoint and Node.js solutions
Implementation of modern webparts using SPFx and React
Integration with external APIs and microservices development
Implementation of Components in AEM Platform
Development of dynamic pages in SharePoint 2013 and Modern
Implementation of solutions using React, Vue.js and AngularJS
Creation of custom webparts with SPFx and TypeScript
Development of responsive interfaces in SharePoint
Maintenance and optimization of existing pages

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Some of my recent work
portfolio.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each one represents a unique challenge and a learning experience.

experiences.fullstackDesc: Complete solutions with the latest technologies

process.question: How does the development process work?
process.answer: The process begins with a detailed requirements analysis, followed by architecture planning and iterative development with constant client feedback.

timeline.question: What is the average project timeline?
timeline.answer: The timeline varies according to project complexity, but typically web projects take 4 to 12 weeks to complete.

contact.title: Let's Create Something Amazing Together
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to new opportunities and would love to hear about your project.
